title: Google IT Automation with Python
description: Google Certificate scholarship, in partnership with Code Like a Girl

modules.title: Crash Course on Python
modules.description: Learn the basics of Python programming.

modules.title: Using Python to Interact with the Operating System
modules.description: Learn how to use Python to write programs that do in minutes what would take you hours to do by hand - no prior programming experience required.

modules.title: Introduction to Git and GitHub
modules.description: Learn how to use Git and GitHub.

modules.title: Troubleshooting and Debugging Techniques
modules.description: Learn how to approach debugging programs systematically, and how to automate the debugging process.

modules.title: Configuration Management and the Cloud
modules.description: Learn how to automate and configure applications using Ansible.

modules.title: Automating Real-World Tasks with Python
modules.description: Learn how to use Python scripts to automate tasks.

extra: This course covers various essential skills for IT Specialists, including file and process manipulation, regular expressions, Linux command line usage (Qwiklabs), log file processing, Python programming, file I/O, subprocesses, input streams, Bash scripting, automatic testing, data processing, report generation, and setting up a developer environment for automation tools.
